pr_title: Improve map not found error messaging

timeline.message:
Improve map not found error messaging

Tell the user the name of the map that could not be found
and the paths on file system that were searched.
Further improve error message and remove unused exception constructor.

timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText: That's a bit of a band-aid fix as we are still searching duplicate paths. candidatePaths should not return duplicates in the first place.
replies.author: DanVanAtta
